sql.body: REPLACE INTO crm_rfm_setting (company_id, org_id, store_id, r_v1, r_v2, r_v3, r_v4, f_v1, f_v2, f_v3, f_v4, m_v1, m_v2, m_v3, m_v4, val_type, tenant_id, creator, createTime) VALUES (:companyId, :orgId, :storeId, :rV1, :rV2, :rV3, :rV4, :fV1, :fV2, :fV3, :fV4, :mV1, :mV2, :mV3, :mV4, :type, :companyId,:createUserId, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

REPLACE INTO crm_rfm_setting (company_id, org_id, store_id, r_v1, r_v2, r_v3, r_v4, f_v1, f_v2, f_v3, f_v4, m_v1, m_v2, m_v3, m_v4, val_type, tenant_id, creator, createTime) VALUES ( ?, -1, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
SELECT <@rfm_setting_fields /> FROM crm_rfm_setting AS rfm WHERE rfm.company_id = :companyId AND rfm.org_id = :orgId AND rfm.store_id = :storeId AND rfm.delete_flag = 0
SELECT <@rfm_setting_fields /> FROM crm_rfm_setting AS rfm WHERE rfm.company_id = :companyId AND rfm.org_id = -1 AND rfm.store_id <> -1 AND rfm.delete_flag = 0
SELECT <@rfm_fields /> FROM crm_member_rfm AS rfm WHERE rfm.member_id = :memberId AND rfm.company_id = :companyId ORDER BY rfm.compute_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT <@rfm_fields /> FROM crm_member_rfm AS rfm WHERE rfm.member_id = :memberId AND rfm.company_id = :companyId UNION ALL SELECT <@rfm_fields /> FROM crm_member_rfm_history AS rfm WHERE rfm.member_id = :memberId AND rfm.company_id = :companyId
